name: taplock
description: TapLock - A dead simple secret manager powered by passkeys. No passwords, just tap.

scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:watch" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.dev:watch: cd frontend && npx vite build --watch --mode development
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd worker && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && npx wrangler deploy --env preview
